div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 285 Delos, 1911 (318) Burial: c. 129 B.C. (T); c. 88 (Hackens) Contents: c. 250 AR. Pot hoard from excava- tions Athens: New Style tetradr. Disposition: Athens † Thompson, Athens (Delos ΛΗ), pp. 484-6, illus.; NC 1962, p. 323 Lewis, NC 1962, p. 280 Hackens, BCH 1965, p. 516
